title: AI Paper Implementations from Scratch
subtitle: Interactive tutorials explaining foundational AI papers with theory and runnable code
description: Deep dive into important AI and AI-for-Science papers. Each paper is broken into digestible chunks with mathematical explanations and Python implementations you can modify and run directly in your browser. Perfect for researchers and practitioners who want to truly understand how these models work.
features: Interactive Python code you can modify
No local setup required - runs in browser

planned_series.title: Physics-Informed Neural Networks (PINNs)
planned_series.description: Learn how to embed physical laws directly into neural network training.

planned_series.title: Neural Ordinary Differential Equations
planned_series.description: Continuous-depth neural networks using ODE solvers.

planned_series.title: DeepONet: Learning Nonlinear Operators
planned_series.description: Branch-trunk architecture for learning operators between function spaces.
